oai_dc:dc.dc:contributor: The New Digital Bleek and Lloyd Archive
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: |han=kass'o (Klein Jantje) (VIII)
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: |han=kass'o speaks of the guns brought by the Koranna to his people's place when they acquired cattle. Before then the Koranna had used blades. 1) See also Koranna commando destroyed by ||ua, 2) This story is found in Book VIII-18.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Lucy Lloyd |xam notebooks
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: The Korannas brought guns (while they felt that they had not a little cattle)
